customBlockData.display:message:
%%[
VAR @Salutation,@FirstName,@LastName,@FullName, @DonationAmount
SET @FullName = TRUE
SET @FirstName = Recurring_Donation__c:Contact__r:FirstName
SET @LastName = Recurring_Donation__c:Contact__r:LastName
SET @DonationAmount = Recurring_Donation__c:Amount__c

IF @FullName THEN 
    SET @Salutation = CONCAT(@LastName, @FirstName) ELSEIF NOT EMPTY(@FirstName) THEN
    SET @Salutation = @FirstName 
ELSEIF NOT EMPTY(@LastName) THEN
    SET @Salutation = @LastName 
ENDIF
]%%綠色和平捐款會員%%=v(@Salutation)=%%：十分謝謝您以每月捐款 NT$%%=v(@DonationAmount)=%% 元支持東南亞環保倡議專案！您將收到定期專案成果與資助人專屬活動邀請，請持續關注綠色和平最新環保消息。如需諮詢，歡迎您來電至會員服務專線 (02)23612025

store.selectedContentBuilderMessage:
%%[
VAR @Salutation,@FirstName,@LastName,@FullName, @DonationAmount
SET @FullName = TRUE
SET @FirstName = Recurring_Donation__c:Contact__r:FirstName
SET @LastName = Recurring_Donation__c:Contact__r:LastName
SET @DonationAmount = Recurring_Donation__c:Amount__c

IF @FullName THEN 
    SET @Salutation = CONCAT(@LastName, @FirstName) ELSEIF NOT EMPTY(@FirstName) THEN
    SET @Salutation = @FirstName 
ELSEIF NOT EMPTY(@LastName) THEN
    SET @Salutation = @LastName 
ENDIF
]%%綠色和平捐款會員%%=v(@Salutation)=%%：十分謝謝您以每月捐款 NT$%%=v(@DonationAmount)=%% 元支持東南亞環保倡議專案！您將收到定期專案成果與資助人專屬活動邀請，請持續關注綠色和平最新環保消息。如需諮詢，歡迎您來電至會員服務專線 (02)23612025
